strings.Value: "Starving to death is a fine sacrifice to Groetus…"
"Only by starving myself to death and rejecting this mortal flesh shall I perceive the divine wisdom of my Lord…"
"Think again, sir dwarf! We're not in a desert — there's plenty of game about, and a town not far away. No one's going to starve to death!"
"All this drama because we're running a bit low on rations… You know, Harrim, if you had the slightest hint of talent, you might become a decent tragedy poet. Or a professional mourner."
"I've always respected the religious beliefs of others, but it's still disturbing to hear someone call upon death for no particular reason."
"Oh, now even I will say you're overreacting. We'll chance across some peddler and buy something to eat. Or one of us will go out to set some traps."
"Fearsomeful words! Need to find food fast, before your terrible words completely kill us all!"
